original_text: When we left Malta, we had been there for three months. We got on a ship that was called ‘The Twin Gods’. It had come from Alexandria and it had stayed in Malta during the winter.
korean_text: 석 달 후에 우리가 그 섬에서 겨울을 난 알렉산드리아 배를 타고 떠나니 그 배의 머리 장식은 디오스구로라

sentences.original_text: we had been there for three months
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그곳에 석 달 동안 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it had stayed in Malta during the winter
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 겨울 동안 말타에 머물렀습니다
